data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Jingmen, Hubei, China that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jingmen, Hubei, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Jingmen you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary: On average, 65 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Jingmen, Hubei, China.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Jingmen, Hubei, China.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Jingmen. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, 0.1% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Jingmen, Hubei, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 65,946 believers in the county of Jingmen the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Jingmen, Hubei, China that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.
